column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////In regards to our prices
column2: I can tell you that over the years I have visited dozens of ramen shops worldwide
column3: and I've spent as little as $8 for a bowl of ramen and as much as $20. What I have learned is that each ramen shop is unique in its own way -- from the noodles and broth they use
column4: to the side dishes they serve
column5: to the price points they target.
